programme.title: Harry Enfield
programme.short_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is comedian Harry Enfield
programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is comedian Harry Enfield.
programme.long_synopsis:
Sue Lawley's castaway on this week's Desert Island Discs is comedian Harry Enfield. As well as talking about characters such as Loadsamoney, Kevin the Teenager and Tory Boy, Harry reveals his reasons for not campaigning with Tony Blair at the general election.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs] 

Favourite track: Nabucco Overture To Nabucco by Giuseppe Verdi
Book: Bleak House by Charles Dickens
Luxury: Beer and a cigarette machine

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
